website_summaries.verdict: The Bandit 2 has a flexible upper that allows it to conform to most feet. A great choice if you want a lightweight shoe that lets your feet breathe.
pros: A good-sized toe box leaves some wiggle room
We love how the breathable material not only flexes to fit your foot but also leaves your feet nice and cool
They're lightweight, making them easy to wear all day

customer_reviews.title: Warning!! They may get holes!
customer_reviews.text: These Shoes Developed a hole in the top of one shoe. Shoes never abused, just walked in. They fit but If given the same circumstances, I would purchase a better shoe. Never had any shoe develop a hole in such an odd place.
customer_reviews.author: DBCooper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable shoes I have ever bought! I was a little hesitant on getting them because of the price, but I am extremely happy that I did. I work in a hospital and I am always on my feet. These are my favorite shoes to wear while working a 12 hour shift. Might order another pair in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Miles of walking in Disney
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes brand new to Disney for 8 days without any problems. I didn't even have to break them in. The toe box had plenty of room. Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lisha Merryman

customer_reviews.title: I loved the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoe, but they run small. I normally wear a 6.5-7 so I ordered a 7 (after reading reviews about how they run smaller) figuring it would be great. I was wrong! I am returning them to order a 7.5. Other than that, I love them because they are SO light (I tried walking around in them for a bit) and cute. Sucks that I will have to wait for Amazon to get the return and then re-order them and wait for delivery!
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour shoes = A+
customer_reviews.text: Recommend buying 1/2 size bigger than your normal size. Comfortable, stylish, and light. Definitely affordable. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Kelber

customer_reviews.title: SIZE UP
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. I defiantly followed reviews suggestions and ordered up in size. I am normally a 6 1/2 ordered a 7 and they fit perfectly. I have noticed a great difference in my running and feel great about it. They provide so much needed support since I am on my feet all day at work. Definetly going to get antother pair 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned these before, bought at a local shoe store. Wanted them again but had to order online since shoe stores local to me no longer carry them. I’ve always worn a 7.5 but these looked small right out of the box and they fit small as well. I’d say order a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Cute and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Wore them to an SF Giants baseball game recently and they were so comfortable. No foot pain after wearing them for several hours while walking around the stadium and the city. I look forward to running in them soon. They are very sturdy and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Psychexpert

customer_reviews.title: I read one of the questions and answers that inicated ...
customer_reviews.text: I read one of the questions and answers that inicated that it was True-to-Size. IT IS NOT! It's very small, and I got stuck having to pay return shipping. They're cute, but beware of the size. I'm ordering a half size bigger from another vendor who has free return shipping, just in case I need a full size larger than my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: grace stramiello

customer_reviews.title: Nice but run small
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes they are really comfortable however, they run a bit small. I got them in wide width (C/D) and figured a size 7 would do as my gemini 3 was in wide width as well and I got a size 7 in those and I love them but the bandit 2 fits too perfect. I would suggest getting a half size up if you prefer a little extra room. They are really nice though, very comfortable indeed. I don't mind the perfect fit but would prefer a little bit of space. So, go half size up if you prefer a little extra room!
customer_reviews.author: eveliyah

customer_reviews.title: 2 Months and already falling apart
customer_reviews.text: It's been about 2 months and both shoes already have a hole in the same spot. It sucks that you pay this much for name brand shoes and the fall apart writhing the first 2 months, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nick/Terry/Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds!
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches and these are the second pair in a less than a year I've gotten (2 diff colors to add to my collection) and I can not stress enough how they feel like walking/ running/ working out on clouds! I have long narrow feet and usually wear a size 10. That's what I ordered and they're perfect! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and look of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and look of the shoe, but the fit is a little snug. I usually wear 6.5 - 7, so I went with the larger of the two sizes due to the reviews I read. My toes are all the way to the end with no room to wiggle. I have never worn a 7.5 in my life, but I could have used them on this pair. They definitely run small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe. Lightweight. Stylish. Quality-made.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 almost 90% of the time. So far, every UA shoe I've purchased I've needed a size 8. (I went to their website to get the exact shoe size since someone mentioned they run smaller than what we're used to.) Extremely comfortable. Lightweight. Stylish. Does not make your foot look flat or long. I purchased the black and gray and you cannot tell if they're dirty. I am considering buying these again as backup in case they discontinue the model.
customer_reviews.author: MISO

customer_reviews.title: A Tad too small, wish stores carried these
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they don't fit, i got the size i normally wear and they are just a tad too small. Im sure if they fit they would be a great shoe. I wish they carried these in the store so you could try them on first, now i have to return them after having waited for them to come. And i cant order another pair a half size bigger because the product is constantly out. Too bad can't find in the store's
customer_reviews.author: Joy L Jones

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 stars because they were way to small. My size is 6.5 and these were way smaller than normal so I had to return. I loved the color & the look but by the time I went to order in a size larger they were sold out.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes. Loved being past-tense. I got them to wear as my daily work shoe. I don’t stand or walk for long periods of time. I’m sitting 90% of my day. On both the shoes - there are holes right around where my 5th toe hits. They started developing after only having the shoes for 5 months. I bought them in April and now the holes are so large you can see my socks through them. I always buy UnderArmour shoes, but these are trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but order a 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are comfortable and I love the color. I fallowed the other reviewers tip and ordered a 1/2 size larger then I normally wear and I’m glad I did. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: love love these shoes fit just as expected I typically ...
customer_reviews.text: love love these shoes fit just as expected I typically wear a 7 in running shoes and these fit just right probably might want to go up half a size as they do fit me right on. great support and squishy on the palm of your foot as well as the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Ymontoya

customer_reviews.title: Shoes came dirty and already worn
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package and looking at the shoe box it appeared the shoe box lived a hard life already had holes in it and was beat up. Seeing this led me to inspecting the shoes closely. The bottom of the shoes had dirt or some kind of gunk already in the tread pattern. Also it appeared that some one attempted to clean the top if the shoes because I could see light staining. Finally the tip of the shoes are different colors due to being worn and heavily soiled this is the most obvious area of the shoe where you can tell these shoes have been worn, dirtied, and then sold at new prices.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Webb

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good style
customer_reviews.text: My first time ordering UA running shoes, I have high arches and these shoes feel ok for short runs, (3 or less miles), but anything over that and my feet hurt the next day. I also felt like my toes were falling over the front edge of the shoes. I will stick with my tried and true asics nimbus for any serious running, these will quickly become my knockaround shoes to wear while running errands. Cute shoes and true to normal size.
customer_reviews.author: PBJ

customer_reviews.title: 5 to 7 after reading the reviews and they fit perfect! I'm using them as work shoes
customer_reviews.text: I went up half a size from 6.5 to 7 after reading the reviews and they fit perfect! I'm using them as work shoes. I'm a RN in the emergency department and they have been working very well. They are very comfortable my feet do not hurt like they usually do after a 12 hour shift like they do with nikes. I'm so glad I decided to give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Portia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great, light-weight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great, light-weight shoe! I bought these for my daughter and wasn't sure if they'd fit because she has wide foot, but these fit her perfectly in a regular width. She has worn them for a few indoor softball tournaments, and they are holding up great. Turf is rough on shoes, so I would definitely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go up at least a 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing, they are SO comfortable!! I just did I 5k and my feet still feel amazing. Great support for high arches, and they feel like pillows on my feel. Super light weight, and the fabric reminds me of a sock. I normally wear an 8.5/9 and I got a 9.5 to be safe, and they fit perfect!! Go up at least a 1/2 size or more.
customer_reviews.author: JoEllen Horn

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are my favorites. The are good looking and super comfy. But after just 3 months I've worn a hole through both toes. They need to widen the rubber at the tip of the toe because I really like the material of the upper part of the shoe. But it just isn't durable enough. I'm a cna and do about 4 miles a day at work. 3 months of durability is unacceptable. But I do live this shoe. Too bad there's a hole on them.
customer_reviews.author: Woofdoof

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! Arch support is great. I use these shoes to workout in and they are so comfortable. Very light weight which is nice when doing cardio. Even doing some shopping for the day is comfortable in the shoes. Totally recommend to get these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Order a size up than you normally wear. I bought thinner socks and love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kicklighter

customer_reviews.title: after 42 days of returning home I bought and wore the second shoe for a physical test and it was like second skin to my feet
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair I have bought. I was having a lot of foot pains while running in the desert and this shoe eliminated ALL pains. Additionally, after 42 days of returning home I bought and wore the second shoe for a physical test and it was like second skin to my feet. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA ALLADIN

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers!
customer_reviews.text: I went up an additional half size (plus the half size for runners), and these are great! I ran 4 miles out of the box and they performed excellent. No blisters, sore spots, or other issues. I haven't tried them for longer distances yet but I anticipate no issues. They are light, comfortable, and I love the integrated tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money for the quality you get
customer_reviews.text: Bought three pairs of these and not good quality. Will not be buying under armor shoes anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: very glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this shoe before ordering, very glad I did. Several people stated that it runs half size small. I ordered a half size bigger than I normally wear, fit is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes...unfortunately they don't love my feet. They say its a true to fit but thats a lie, when the shoe arrived it was small in the toes and while the width was normal, there is no possible way you can run in these shoes. I can see how people would develop holes in the shoe if they just accepted it was tight and moved on. If it wasn't small in the toes then it would probably be a comfy shoe but it was too tight and my toes kept bumping the top. I would suggest going a half size up because the shoes are super cute and it does cost money in return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: mstee

customer_reviews.title: but so comfortable and with such amazing arch support that I will ...
customer_reviews.text: These are somewhat narrow, but so comfortable and with such amazing arch support that I will deal with the narrow (which I'm sure will stretch in no time).
customer_reviews.author: Carol Pingel

customer_reviews.title: Small fit, narrow
customer_reviews.text: These were smaller than other Under Armour shoes I have purchased in the same size. I believe they are narrow and a bit shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bachleitner

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really well made and offer great support. I do think they run .5 size small, but besides that they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: Firm but great
customer_reviews.text: Very firm, which is beneficial for me. I work long days and have arch pain frequently. these shoes work well for me almost like compression socks do. If I buy again, I would size up for a little more room. I vary between 8.5 and 9,but bought an 8.5 just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Taylr

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but SIZE UP!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer with plantar fasciitis, so these shoes feel like they are going to be comfortable and supportive for my feel feet. I'm usually an 8 1/2, so I ordered a 9 based on some other reviews. They were still too small - toes touched the end. So I ordered a 9 1/2 from a other site as they weren't available on Amazon. I never wear a 9 1/2. So they must run extremely small.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a lightweight long distance running shoe and this was the perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews prior to purchasing. I was looking for a lightweight long distance running shoe and this was the perfect fit!! Per other reviews, I ordered a half size up. I wear size 8.5 in Nike running shoes; I ordered a size 9 in this UA running shoe and it fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe Order 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.text: It felt good when I first put them on but, while out walking I noticed that they were a bit small. I can wear them in the gym ONLY, I bought them to run in and they were too small. :(
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bethea

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! The color is fantastic the comfort is spot on! I did purchase my regular size. I wear an 8 in Brooks and got an 8 in these and the toe box is so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Erica D. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: As far as I am concerned UA makes the best athletic shoes on the market
customer_reviews.text: As far as I am concerned UA makes the best athletic shoes on the market. They feel like a glove on my feet. I have two pairs and plan to use them all summer long and at the gum too!!
customer_reviews.author: AngelZ

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this sneaker! I do wish I ordered a 1/2 size up. I am a size 7 in everything and I have other Under Armour sneakers size 7 and they are fine. I kept them but my toes do touch the front.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen P.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. Did not take a long time to break ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Did not take a long time to break in. Wore it for a 2-mile run fresh out of the box and no blisters or feet pain. My preferred running shoes among all the running shoes I owned.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffers

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work, I am a nurse, I walk a lot, and I love these. I have 2 pairs, there doesn't seem to be a "break in" period for any of my under armour shoes. They have done well in the washing machine too.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fits great.
customer_reviews.text: With Under Armour sneakers, you have to get a size larger. For me, I take a size 10 womens but I had to order a size 11. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Keim

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these fit !! I am on my feet for my job for several hours everyday. These definitely help my knees and ankles from aching. The arch support is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size larger as recommended and they fit great. One of the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. I stand all day and work, which sometimes means 12 to 16 hours and they were comfortable the first day. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Product looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Product looks exactly like the picture. I like these a lot. Only thing is that they are cut small which can make workouts a tad uncomfortable. These are perfect if you’re just wearing them to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Rock

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes great look great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes great look great fit, feels good on your feet. I do everything in these shoes, run, lift weights, cross fit. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: April Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I actually have bought the same ones 3x. Probably going to buy again. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: silencewaits

customer_reviews.title: and these are my favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: I am a tennis shoe fanatic, and these are my favorite so far. I always wear a size 8 in Under Armour and all other major brands. I ordered a half size larger(8.5) due to the other reviews, and they fit perfectly! They are so cushiony but yet firm with support, great to workout in. They look and feel fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Brown

customer_reviews.title: Will wear them sockless
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and this model, have 3 pair in this discontinued style, but sadly ordered this pair one size too small
customer_reviews.author: lisahbutler

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7 but bought a 7.5. Very comfortable. I started running and they seem to be holding up well. The color is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Ripped in a couple months
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable while they lasted. After about 2-3 months they ripped on the outsides of both shoes. I do not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Green

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeee
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this shoe normally I have to tried on a 100 different kinds before I can find the right pair I just ordered these cause I liked the style & color they had & these are soooo comfortable even my friend got her a pair 10 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet, average/narrow heel... so supportive and comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I always buy a half size up and these are great. I have wide feet, average heel and these are my go-to shoe. LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Merc

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but size runs small
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift, but appears to run a half size small... returned for larger size (really easy with Amazon!!) and she loves these shoes... she thinks they are the best shoes she has ever owned for running.
customer_reviews.author: JacksGP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love UA shoes. Get complimented on this color all the time.
customer_reviews.author: erin0525

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I work on concrete floors daily and these have excellent support as well as cushion. Fit was as expected, I normally wear 6.5 and do have slightly wider feet. I ordered the 6.5 size and they fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly CM

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! Used not new
customer_reviews.text: Product was supposed to be new, they were clearly used. Dirty and knots in laces. Totally unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: T&Epeterson

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and they don't dig in by the Achilles
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on these shoes! They fit great and they don't dig in by the Achilles!
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Get a size up
customer_reviews.text: I always wear an 8. Kinda tight but very cute
customer_reviews.author: Jillisa

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Always buy 1/2 size up. Great sneaker but they run small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... 26 years and these shoes by far are the best pair of shoes for my this profession
customer_reviews.text: I have worked in healthcare for 26 years and these shoes by far are the best pair of shoes for this profession. My feet don't hurt. My legs don't hurt. My back doesn't hurt. I love them so much that I now have 3 extra pairs in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Newton

customer_reviews.title: Not good for a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shoe it's comfortable but if you have a wide foot like I do they will wear out sooner than you want. Mine wore a hole by where my little toe is and it really bummed me out.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable for all types of work outs
customer_reviews.text: one of my fav pairs of tennis shoes .. never owned UA shoes until i ordered these. i was pleasantly surprised. very comfortable for all types of work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Laurin

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive! Great work shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very good support. Can wear for hours walking and standing and feet don’t hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... because this trainer is somewhat smaller but my sister loved it. She mentioned it has good support with ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked at previous comments and bought one size up because this trainer is somewhat smaller but my sister loved it. She mentioned it has good support with high in sole
customer_reviews.author: Lisel Carib

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SHOES! These shoes are super light and comfortable for everyday wear and to the gym. In other shoes I'm a size 8 and read in the reviews to size up a half size and I'm glad I did as an 8 would've been too small. Other than that they are great and I will probably continue to buy under armour from here on out, these have held up great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much I got two more pair! They are so comfortable and fit great. If you need a bigger toe box and not necessarily a wide shoe this shoe is perfect! They get more comfortable as you wear them. You do need to order a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Roy & Melissa Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and perfect for running and training. These shoes will last me forever and my feet feel fine after working two jobs being on them all day! Comfortable sole is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Corona

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, runs small
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good shoe. But in my case it was too small and my size was not available on prime so I ordered it through UA directly.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha B.

customer_reviews.title: I love my new shoes
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you order a 1/2 size up. I love my new shoes. They are super cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They are very airy and comfortable! I usually wear a 7 and ordered a 7 1/2 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: glad I ordered a 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.text: Fit and a little snug, glad I ordered a 1/2 size larger. The back on the shoe (heel) is a little harder than I'd like which might cause a blister but hasn't yet, so we'll see
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and I took one look at them and they’re going right back. They’re extremely light weight and cheap. I can’t imagine that they would last more than a few months before my toe goes right through the side. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Harten

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like these for running
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like these for running... they seem to be heavy and not enough cushion. They’re very pretty so I may keep them for lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha B

customer_reviews.title: Bad glue
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable! My problem is the glue on the front of both shoes is already coming loose. :( It seems to be a flaw with the glue on this shoe, as I've worn-out others Under Armor shoes, and have never had this problem before. It's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: V Ivers

customer_reviews.title: Under armour
customer_reviews.text: I love them very comfortable and I love the color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes so far
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes so far. Very comfortable and had a few great runs in them. I don't recommend them for rainy/wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: Beanz

customer_reviews.title: Sizing a BIG issue! 😢
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked good, but the fit was way off. I am not even sure if a half size bigger would work either. They ran extremely small. I regretfully had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great look comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: These look great and this is the second pair of shoes from this company the first pair lasted for two years!
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves them. She says they fit smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. She says they fit smaller than her previous pair. She gets complements on them all the time. She has the blue/green pair and she bought these also.
customer_reviews.author: EDGARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe. But runs small. Ordered a size up and still could hand went up another 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Comfy... NOT quality tho
customer_reviews.text: Sad these didn’t work. Bought them, loved them for about a week, then a week later there’s a hole already. I am not rough on shoes. I can normally wear shoes for years before having any type of flaws like this. Really disappointed because they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Edwards

customer_reviews.title: But they are very comfy and feel like you're walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: Definitely buy at least a half size up. I have small feet, usually a 5, and even the 5.5 is snug. But they are very comfy and feel like you're walking on clouds! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Lydia M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes - just got them in another color. I'm not a runner but walk a lot and these are perfect! I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as comfortable as the ones in the store (
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as a supportive shoe for mild overpronation. They aren't. They fit ok, not as comfortable as the ones in the store (??) even went back to try the store ones on. That seems a bit odd. After a couple gym trips I had horrible blisters on my ankles. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good, except there are two extra rivets for the laces at the top that tend to dig into your foot if you don't have the tongue perfectly straight.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, the fit is a little snug. Next pair I will order a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good for me, good for you!
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good quality, good look, good performance. I'm happy with my Under Armour and my Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia A.

customer_reviews.title: These run small!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great but they run small. They are slim fit so I would recommend going a full size up. I will reorder in 9 (I'm an 8) once the refund goes through.
customer_reviews.author: rosdell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter she loves them
customer_reviews.author: YESENIA PAGAN

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size. Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Im a true women’s 10 and these fit perfectly! I am so glad I decided to order these. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ash K

customer_reviews.title: OMG I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: OMG I LOVE these shoes!! I'm not a runner, more of a gym rat. So to start running I wanted new good shoes, and these are amazing! Great support and they look good too. I'm normally a size 8,5 but they where to small but 9 fitted perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia H

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color and so comfy! I've gotten compliments on it ! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Light weight, good arch support, room to wiggle my toes. Ordered a size 8 - which is my usual size.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is very comfortable. I have not ran in them yet
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable. I have not ran in them yet. Buy a have a size bigger cause they run small.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sid not fit well at all. Had a big seam on top front that hurt. Returned them
customer_reviews.author: LAUREN

customer_reviews.title: They looked cool but did not fit well for me
customer_reviews.text: These run very short and narrow. I ordered a 9 (my usual size) and my toe was smashed up against the front of the shoe. I tried a 9.5 and my toe was still rubbing on the top of the shoe, which would never work for a running shoe. They looked cool but did not fit well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy.Stein.Miller

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's RailFit 1 Cross-Country Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Heathered upper is light, breathable & extremely stretchable. Seamless internal heel cup for a locked-in, anatomical fit throughout the foot. Smooth, ultrasonic welded seaming with Bemis tape for next-to-skin support & comfort. Firm external heel counter for additional support that keeps the back of the foot in place. Unique tongue construction connects to the upper to stay put & further enhance fit. Molded Micro Gfootbed takes the shape of your foot for great cushioning & fit. Two-piece Charged Cushioningmidsole is firmer below the heel & softer below the forefoot for a blend of support & comfort that‘s built to perform. Rubber outsole provides full ground contact with deep flex grooves for extra flexibility where you need it most. High abrasion rubber added to high wear areas on the heel for increased durability . Weight: 8.1 oz.
